name: Ekphrasis
description:
Ekphrasis is a 2D puzzle game where players can solve and examine a unique set of artifacts. Artifacts each have their own unique mechanics to solve them based on sound, color, sequencing, and more. Once solved, players can name and categorize them within the archive. Ekphrasis presents carefully crafted and unique puzzles, as well as challenging mysteries and opportunities to find hidden meaning through its branching story.

Key features:

  • Unique puzzle design
  • Branching, choice-based narrative
  • Minimalist artstyle and soundtrack
  • Curated, historical artworks
